New Year With LaTeX Support Plus Comment Changes

07 Jan 2020

It’s a new year!
Which means another go at this blog.
For \(\forall posts \in blog\), enable LaTeX.

Additionally, I’ve shifted from just-comments to the utterances.es widget. For a cleaner and less spam-ish comment interface.
